prompt: Chiikawastyle,Usagi,This is a digital drawing in a cartoon style featuring Usagi, an anthropomorphic rabbit. Usagi has a round, cream-colored body with large, expressive black eyes and pink blush marks on the cheeks. The ears are long and pink inside, standing upright. Usagi is smiling with a small, triangular nose and a simple, black line mouth. The background is a soft, pastel green with a few light green and white spots, giving a whimsical feel. In the bottom right corner, there is a small, identical Usagi character, adding a sense of depth and playfulness. The overall mood is cute and cheerful.
